description:
FLOOSS is now Sharia Compliant, offering access to INSTANT finance whenever and whatever you need it for 24/7
Get fast approval and instant financing disbursed to your account whenever you need it!
FLOOSS is proud to be the first and fastest Islamic finance provider in the Kingdom of Bahrain. If you are 21 or older, employed, and a resident of Bahrain, apply today and enjoy a seamless and enhanced financial journey.
OTHER APP FEATURES:
Buy Now Pay Later
Device Financing with Batelco & Channels by STC
Flooss Bahrain B.S.C (Closed) and Payment International Enterprise B.S.C (Closed) are licensed by Central Bank of Bahrain as a Financing Company and Ancillary Service Provider (respectively)
Fastest approvals you’ve ever seen and Instant Cash in your account or stc pay wallet, Minimal requirements, No physical branch visits required, 100% digital

Shari'a Compliant Profit Specifications for Personal Financing:
•Murabaha Margin 16%-18%
•Maximum Finance: 1500 BHD
•Minimum Finance: 100 BHD
•Max Financing Duration: 18 Months
•Minimum Financing Duration: 2 Months
Islamic Financing Eligibility:
• Employed or Retired
• Age 21 to 64
• Bahraini OR Bahraini Resident
Finance Features:
• Licensed by the CBB as a Sharia Compliant Financing Company
• Fast Approvals
• Easy Application Process
• Instant Money Disbursed
• Repayment period up to 18 months
• Paperless Application
• No Hidden Charges
• Instantly credited to bank account OR STC Pay wallet within few seconds
Documents required to apply:
3 months bank statement account that includes your salary details OR select open banking for instant approval
Fees and Charges:
Murabaha Margin 16%-18%
Admin Fees 6.5 BHD (Fixed for all customers)
VAT (10% from the Admin Fees)
Liability Letter Fee - 0
Financial Statement - 0
Early Settlement - 1% of the outstanding credit facility amount or BD 100, whichever is lower.
Late Payment Fee - 0
Release Letter Fee- 0 (No Obligation Letter)
"Stevie Gold Award-Winning App in the MENA Region، awarded by Deloitte and the STEVIE Awards Finalist in the Visa Everywhere Initiative 2024"
Security of your data is our top priority; FLOOSS does not share your information and will never ask for PINs.

Contact Us:
For inquiries or help, contact us at info@flooss.com or 13310055.

Data Self-Portrait is a unique application for tracking life data and artistic visualization. By recording daily data such as sleep, consumption, mood and activities, the application transforms the dull numbers into flowing abstract art graphics, allowing you to "see" your life patterns from a new perspective. The minimalist information visualization design style, combined with the colorful data flow effect, enables your personalized data portrait to continuously evolve with each data addition, showcasing your unique life trajectory. It supports data statistics analysis, historical record management and data export functions. All data is stored locally, ensuring the protection of your privacy and security.

ila is a digital, mobile-only bank, that’s built around your needs and aspirations. We understand how you use technology to help you make the most out of your money.

‘ila’ is the Arabic word for ‘to’ and we are here to truly reflect your needs and lifestyle, evolving with you on your journey.

We understand how you use technology to help you make the most out of your money, ‘ila’ is the Arabic word for ‘to’ and we are here to truly reflect your needs and lifestyle, evolving with you on your journey.


- Join ila in minutes
All you need is 1 ID and a selfie, there is no need to visit a branch or sign any documents.

- Instantly issued Virtual card
You will get your virtual card in your app as soon as your account is open, and you can start using it for all your online transactions.

- A cool green card
Enjoy using your green ila debit card anywhere in the world. Use contactless payments to speed up your transactions, making your purchases extra secure as the card never leaves your hand.

- Bahraini Dinar account with tiered interest
The money in your account earns you interest, interest that’s tiered. The more you save, the more you earn.

- Open and link foreign Currency Accounts to your card
Open Foreign Currency accounts in two easy steps from your app and link multiple currencies to your cards. Spend in local currencies and have the freedom to explore the world.

- Easy ways to fund your account
Simply use your existing bank debit card, BenefitPay, bank transfer, or fund your account by depositing cash or cheque at an ila ATM.

- Rewarding Credit Cards
Apply for a Credit Card directly from the app and enjoy 100% control. Get 1% cashback on all spends and a chance to win Gold every month for every BHD 1 you spend! 

- Save and win BIG with Al Kanz
Deposit money in your Al Kanz Account to get a chance to win BIG. Every BHD 50 is one chance to win cash prizes up to USD 1 Million!


- Start saving with Hassala
Use the Hassala feature to start saving for the things that matter most. Customize your Hassala with a name and icon to keep track of your progress. Set goals with a target amount and date, automate payments from any currency to your Hassala and celebrate once you achieve your goal.

- Start saving groups with Jamiyah
With Jamiyah, you and a group of your trusted friends or family can work together to create a community saving. Each participant will pay a monthly contribution, and when it’s their turn, they will get the entire savings in one month!

- Send money using mobile numbers
You can now transfer money to anyone who has their mobile number registered with their bank account on BenefitPay and enabled the service, for both ila and non ila users!

- A world of amazing benefits with ila Premium
Get exclusive offers, airport lounge access, gadget and travel insurance, higher interest rates, lower fees and charges, better exchange rates and more by subscribing to ila Premium!

- Full control of your cards in the ila app
With a few clicks, you can activate, set and change your card PIN. You can also temporarily freeze and unfreeze your card, report a lost or stolen card and instantly order a new one.

- Apple Pay
Make easy and secure digital payments with ila using Apple Pay

- Refer your friends to ila
Refer your friends and family to open an account with ila via the app.

- Easy Login
Enable biometrics on your phone to easily login to ila.

- 24/7 Support
We’re here if you need use, anytime, anywhere.

Download the ila Bank app now and enjoy banking that reflects you!

Bahrain Address: Bank ABC Tower, Building 152, Road 1703, Block 317, Diplomatic Area, Manama, Bahrain.
ila Bank Bahrain team is available 24/7 to help you. Give us a call on +97317123456

Jordan Address: Bank ABC Building, Shmeisani, 38 Abdul Rahim Al-Waked Street, Amman, Jordan.
ila Bank Jordan team is available 24/7 to help you. Give us a call on +96265100001

BBK Mobile offers a seamless and secure online banking experience for BBK individual customers. Discover the app's key features and services:



Open and Manage Accounts
• New to BBK? Open your account effortlessly!
• Existing customer? Open new accounts and update your information with ease.



View and Manage Your Accounts
• Comprehensive Overview: See all your BBK accounts in one place.
• Easy Access: View and download your statements.
• Convenient Requests: Issue IBAN certificates and order cheque books for your current accounts.
• Detailed Insights: Review account activities and add custom descriptions.
• Personal Touch: Set favorite accounts and personalize their names.



Transfer Funds Locally and Internationally
• Seamless Transfers: Move funds between your BBK accounts and to other BBK accounts.
• Fund Your Account: Fund your account effortlessly using the BenefitPay app.
• Local Convenience: Transfer to any local account in Bahrain using mobile number or IBAN through Fawri+ and Fawri.
• Global Reach: Send money internationally with ease via international and express transfers.
• Efficient Management: Set up beneficiaries and templates for recurring transfers.



Pay and Manage Your Bills
• Effortless Card Payments: View and pay your BBK and CrediMax credit card bills.
• Flexible Payments: Pay your AMEX card bills.
• Stay Connected: View and pay your Batelco and Zain bills.
• Simplified Payments: Pay your bills through Fawateer.
• Recurring Payments: Set up templates for frequent bill payments.



View and Manage Your Cards
• Full Control: Manage your BBK debit cards effortlessly.
• Real-Time Actions: Temporarily stop and reactivate your BBK debit cards instantly.
• Comprehensive Management: View and manage your BBK and CrediMax credit cards and pay your bills.
• Adding Card to Apple Wallet: Add your BBK cards to Apple Wallet for convenient payments.



Investments
• Client Profiling: Tailored investment profiling for personalized strategies.
• Trading Offers: Access exclusive securities trading offers.
• Order Status: Check the status of your orders.
• Portfolio Holdings: View and manage your investment portfolio.



Manage Your Profile and Security Settings
• Enhanced Security: Enable and set up Touch ID and/or Face ID at login.
• Trusted Devices: Set up and manage your trusted devices.
• Personal Information Update: Seamlessly update your contact details, financial information, and other relevant data.
• Secure Account Deactivation: Deactivate your account securely when needed.



Additional Services
• Hub: A new section with shortcuts for faster navigation.
• Dark Mode: A modern look that’s easy on the eyes, day or night.
• Stories: Discover the lates offers and services through our new Stories feature.
• Unified Banking: View and manage all your accounts with multiple banks in Bahrain through open banking.
• Find Us Easily: Locate your nearest BBK branch.
• Stay Connected: Contact us via phone, email, or WhatsApp.



For more inquiries, please call 17207777 or email feedback@bbkonline.com.

Al Salam Bank Digital Banking

This application will allow you to become an Al Salam Bank customer in minutes and give you access to Al Salam Bank’s new Mobile Banking Services.

Please contact our customer care center on (+973) 17005500.

Al Salam Bank is licensed and regulated as an Islamic Retail Bank by the Central Bank of Bahrain.

BenefitPay is an app that allows users to pay and transfer funds only by using their smart devices in Bahrain in a fast, secure, and convenient manner. BenefitPay features include:
 

· Enrolling your payment instruments (Cards & Accounts).
 
· Transfer funds instantly from one bank account to another using Fawri+ service by either entering IBAN, or a registered mobile number, as well as by scanning QR Code.
 
· Paying using your mobile in Bahrain through scanning QR code generated by merchants within the app’s merchant network.
 
· Bill Payment through Fawateer service to hundreds of biller.

· Split Payment and request payment options that allows you to request payment from multiple payer, so it shall allow to split the dinner bill among friends and family.

· Review and track your transactions history.

· Manage your cards and Bank Accounts in the Application
 
· To pay for fuel at petrol stations using geo-location via Sadeem feature
 
. Transfer Internationally via Remittence feature through our partners
 
. Electronic Cheque (e-Cheque) issuance, deposit, and management
 
To register, download the application and enter a valid mobile number. Upon entry of the verification code that will be sent by SMS you will be enrolled and you can start adding your payment instruments.

For Any Inquires or Issues please contact us on:
customerservice@benefit.bh
or
13300300
 

This app is introduced to Bahrain by The BENEFIT Company. The BENEFIT company was established by 17 commercial banks in November 1997 as the national ATM and Point of Sale switch of Bahrain. Today, it foresees Bahrain’s global position in the future of banking in the region. BENEFIT is determined to provide the banking community with top-notch services that can compete on a global scale. The BENEFIT Company provides a wide array of services in the kingdom of Bahrain and in GCC region such as switch service, electronic funds transfer system EFTS, Credit Reference Bureau, Bahrain Cheque Truncation system, Payment Gateway and much more. Visit our website on benefit.bh for more information about our company

Join NBB 
• Open your first account with a simple selfie in less than 5 minutes
• Onboard without the need for a video or phone call verifications

Access your Accounts

Send Money

• To your NBB accounts
• To other NBB beneficiary accounts 
• To other local bank accounts in BHD through Fawri and Fawri+

Pay Utility Bills

Pay Cards

 Card Management

Manage Accounts

Contact Us

نظم مصاريفك بذكاء، خذ جزء من راتبك بشكل مقدم، واحصل على تمويل فوري مع تطبيق ONE – أول تطبيق مالي شامل في مملكة البحرين! 

تطبيق ONE موجود عشان يسهل حياتك ويخليك تدبر أمورك المالية بطريقة أبسط.


المميزات الرئيسية؟

- راتب مقدم: تقدر تأخذ لحد 60٪ من صافي راتبك قبل موعد نزوله بـ 30 يوم.
- تمويل شخصي فوري: حلول تمويل فورية، بسيطة، ومتوافقة مع الشريعة الإسلامية.
- بطاقات الائتمان المميزة: توفر بطاقات مميزة ومتوافقة مع الشريعة الإسلامية لربح المكافآت على مصاريفك اليومية.
- تمويل شخصي مع تحويل الراتب يصل الى 40,000 د.ب
- استثمار في صكوك حكومة البحرين برسوم اشتراك منخفضة وفترات قصيرة بين 3 إلى 12 شهرًا.
- إدارة الميزانية بذكاء: خلي مصاريفك تحت السيطرة مع أدوات تنظم كل أمورك المالية بكل سهولة.
- السوق الرقمي: اكتشف مجموعة متنوعة من المنتجات الرقمية مثل أرصدة الألعاب، بطاقات الهدايا للتسوق الإلكترونية، وخدمات الاشتراك مثل PlayStation، Xbox، Amazon وأكثر.

ليش تطبيق ONE؟

- الشركاء الموثوقين: Benefit، ترابط، وبنك السلام.
- آمن وموثوق: مرخص ومنظم من مصرف البحرين المركزي.
- كل شي واضح: ما في رسوم مخفية.


من مؤهل يحصل على خدماتنا؟

إذا عمرك فوق 21 سنة، موظف، ومقيم في البحرين، التطبيق مناسب لك.


شنو تحتاج عشان تقدم؟

اربط حساب الراتب بالتطبيق وتأكد ان الحساب فعال (تم صرف الراتب في الحساب لمدة ثلاثة أشهر)


أمانك أولويتنا:
بياناتك معانا محفوظة ومعاملاتك كلها مشفرة.



حمل تطبيق ONE وابدأ مشوارك لحياة مالية مرتبة! 

محتاج دعم؟
تواصل معانا على info@1.bh


Track Your Spending, Budget Smarter, Get Paid Early, Get Instant Finance, and more with the ONE App – Bahrain’s First Digital Financial Marketplace! 

Empowering Bahrainis with fast, secure, and flexible tools to achieve financial freedom.

Get Started Now: Download THE ONE App today and take the first step toward financial freedom!

Key Features:


- Get Paid Early: You can take up to 60% of your net salary 30 days before the payday.
- Instant Financing: Easy, Shariah-compliant financing solutions, tailored to your needs.
- Premium Credit Cards: Premium, Sharia-compliant cards are available to earn rewards on your everyday spending.
- Personal Finance with Salary Assignment up to BD 40,000
- Bahrain Government Sukuk investments with low subscription fees and short tenors. 
- Smarter Budgeting: Optimize expenses with intuitive budgeting tools.
- Digital Marketplace: Discover a variety of digital products, including gaming e-vouchers, shopping e-gift cards, and subscription services like PlayStation, Xbox, Amazon, and more


Why Choose THE ONE App?
- Trusted by leading partners: Benefit Company, Tarabut and Al Salam Bank.
- Secure, licensed, and regulated by the Central Bank of Bahrain.
- Transparent fees – no surprises.


Eligibility:
If you're 21+ years old, employed, and a Bahrain resident, ONE App is for you.


Documents Required:
Link your Salary Account (Account must reflect last 3 month's salary credits).




Your Security Matters:
We never share your personal data. All transactions are encrypted for your safety.


Download ONE App today and take the first step toward financial freedom!


Contact Us:
For support, reach us at info@1.bh

description:
Sahel is more than just an app - it’s a platform that connects you to a range of products and services that suit your lifestyle and financial goals.



With Sahel, you can enjoy the following benefits:


•	Apply for a loan or a credit card in minutes with minimal steps and digital documents and signatures. No need to visit the branch or wait for approval.
•	A comprehensive view of your credit card, personal loan, and vehicle loan details
•	Get instant access to your virtual credit card and use it online or in-store.
•	You can also view and manage your card details, PIN, and transactions on the app.
•	A full access to your transactions and statements, as well as quick payments for your loans and credit cards.
•	Make payments for your loans and credit cards using BenefitPay or other convenient options. 
•	A pre-login service that allows you to make payments and locate branches without signing in.
•	Earn and redeem loyalty points in the app for every IMTIAZ transaction you make.
•	Explore a range of after-loan services such as insurance.
•	A new secured login and registration process with 2 factor authentication.
•	Easy to connect your Government E-salary details through Benefit with collaboration of Civil Service Bureau (CSB) for salary bank account statements through Open Banking for a faster approval process of the credit application.



Download Sahel today and discover a new way of digital financing. Sahel is powered by BCFC, the leading financing company in Bahrain.

Discover a smarter way to manage your cards with CrediMax Digital! A modern interface and powerful tools, our app empowers you to take control of your money effortlessly. From checking balances to applying for new cards, and earning rewards, CrediMax Digital App makes every financial interaction simple, secure, and rewarding.

 Key Features:

All-in-One Dashboard: Access your card balances, view recent transactions, and manage high-priority actions all in one place, with a clean and modern design that brings simplicity to your financial life. Easy Payments to Cards: Pay directly to any card in seconds. BBK is available as an option, providing seamless and secure payments that keep you moving forward. Quick Card Applications: Need a new card? Browse options and apply right from the app in minutes. It’s fast, convenient, and designed to fit your lifestyle. Thameen Loyalty Program: Earn points on every purchase and unlock exclusive rewards with Thameen! Easily track your points and explore a wide range of redemption options tailored to your needs. Whether you're managing day-to-day transactions or applying for a new card, CrediMax Digital App brings everything you need to your fingertips. Join us for a smooth, secure, and satisfying financial experience. Why Choose CrediMax Digital? Safe and secure: Your data is encrypted and protected. User-friendly: A sleek, intuitive interface designed for ease of use. Always accessible: 24/7 access to your financial data, payments, and rewards. Download CrediMax Digital App today and start managing your money smarter, with confidence and control!

KFH Mobile App is the mobile banking platform for Kuwait Finance House. It is a powerful tool to take control of your finances, on the go. With an app to do everything you need, you will find fewer reasons to visit a branch. Using the app is really, really simple.

Sign up on the app
Start your digital banking journey simply by downloading the app and signing up on it. No filling up forms, no waiting for passwords. 

Log in with Face ID or Touch ID
No need to remember any more passwords. Enable your biometrics and log in easily and safely.

Manage multiple accounts
Keep a tab on all your accounts at one place. Check your balances, view transfer history, make bill payments and manage beneficiaries - all with a few clicks.

Reset your passwords
If you feel the need to change your passwords at any time, it can be simply done from the app itself.

Convert currencies on the go
Transfer money between your currency accounts conveniently.

Make visits to your branch easier
In case you do need to visit a branch, your KFH Mobile App can help in that too. Generate a teller token for the branch you want to visit so that you don’t have to wait in line.

Video banking
For a more personal interaction, chat with our agent face to face through Video Banking feature on your app.

With all this and more, it makes your banking easy, efficient and safe.

Your dream is in your hands, with Tamara 

Tamara is the financial super-app that gives you full control over your finances. Enjoy the freedom to shop your way and the power to own your dream. 

SIGN UP IN MINUTES
Create your account with your ID and mobile number. No paperwork, no hassle. Your data stays safe, always.

SHOP ANYWHERE
Pay in 4 installments or more, at thousands of partners, online and in-store across, fashion, beauty, electronics, travel, furniture & many more. Just choose Tamara at check-out.

EXCLUSIVE DEALS
Save every time you shop with curated discounts and offers on your favourite stores and brands.

SMART MEMBERSHIP
Enjoy cashback & rewards with Tamara SMART, an exclusive membership program with premium perks such as cashbacks, built-in buyer protection and priority support. 

BUYER PROTECTION
Shop confidently and pay in installments with Tamara. We do everything to keep your shopping experience safe and secure. 

DISCOVER STORES NEARBY
Our newest feature allows you to discover stores near you that accept Tamara, making your shopping experience smooth and seamless. 

24/7 SUPPORT
Our team is here to help you every step of the way.


You’re just one click away from owning your dream. 

Download the Tamara App now

developer: AL BARAKA ISLAMIC BANK B S C -CLOSED
description:
Al Baraka Islamic Bank Bahrain, one of the leading Bahraini financial institutions in the field of Islamic banking, provides its full digital financial services on its digital banking Omni-channel application.
The newly launched app was specifically curated to meet customers’ banking needs by providing them with easy access to seamless banking transactions and a range of products and services without the need to visit the branch. The digital app which will be rolled out across four phases will provide customers with an exceptional banking experience at their fingertips. The features of the app will include a digital customer on-boarding by scanning their personal documents such as CPR, passport, driver’s license, domestic transfers and bill payments through Fawri, Fawri+ and Fawateer, international and internal transfers within the bank, top-up using multiple payment services, credit card payment, as well as cards and accounts management. In addition, the new digital app will also include home page customization, web login using QR code, multiple account login, saving payments as shortcuts, performing actions outside the app, as well as credit card payment using different payment channels, among many other features.

There’s never been a better time to check out PayPal, the trusted way to pay
Say hello to PayPal+, our free loyalty programme that helps you make the most of your money every time you shop with PayPal

SEND & RECEIVE MONEY​
A simple, secure way to quickly send & receive money to friends and family. With encryption technology, we go the distance to help make sure your money transfers are secure

ITS LOYALTY FOR ALL. AND ITS ALL FOR FREE
PayPal+ is the loyalty programme that rewards you with more points, in more ways. Use them almost anywhere PayPal is accepted. And it’s all for free, with no fees and no caps*​
*Rewards are earned as points under the PayPal+ rewards programme. To start earning, you must be enrolled in PayPal+. If you are not yet enrolled, you can sign in the PayPal app. PayPal+ Terms and conditions apply.

MULTIPLY YOUR POINTS WITH THE PAYPAL DEBIT CARD​
Earn up to 10x PayPal+ points when you pay with your PayPal Debit Card, everywhere Mastercard® is accepted. Add it to your mobile wallet, use it in person, and at PayPal checkout to watch your points grow*​
* Set up and activation required. Terms and conditions apply

BUY NOW, PAY LATER​
Keep track of all your PayPal Pay in 3 repayments.* Plus, earn points whenever you use Pay in 3
*Pay in 3 subject to status. Unregulated credit. Available for purchases £20-£3000. Consider if affordable and impact on other borrowing

SEND MONEY GLOBALLY
Send money to friends and family abroad in over 110 countries – or get even more delivery options with Xoom
*Fees and restrictions apply. Transaction, currency conversion, and other fees may apply

MANAGE YOUR SUBSCRIPTIONS ​
Keep track of your different subscriptions at the subscription hub. Easily view, update, or cancel subscriptions, while enjoying updates on recurring payments. Manage recurring payments all in one place. 

POOL MONEY TOGETHER​
Collect money in advance for group gifts, shared experiences, and more and skip the hassle of reimbursement afterward.​
*An account with PayPal is required to create a Pool. Terms and limits apply

PAY HOW YOU WANT​
Add your debit or credit cards* or link your bank accounts for extra flexibility at checkout. You’ll even be able to continue collecting rewards points**
*Using your credit card through your PayPal wallet may impact your rights under Section 75 of the Consumer Credit Act. This means you may lose the right to hold the merchant or your credit card provider jointly liable if you don’t get the goods or services you paid for (if they cost between £100 and £30,000)​
**Subject to issuer’s applicable reward programme terms and conditions

PayPal UK Ltd is authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority (FCA) as an electronic money institution (firm reference number 994790); in relation to its regulated consumer credit activities (firm reference number 996405); and for the provision of cryptocurrency services (firm reference number 1000741). Some products and services, such as PayPal Pay in 3 and PayPal Working Capital, are not regulated by the FCA and may offer a lower level of protection. Please read product terms for further details. BBK BanKey web-based Cash Management platform designed for business entities. 
BBK BanKey Mobile Application is an extension of BBK BanKey web-version that provides you real time access to your business accounts, loan accounts, fixed deposits and corporate cards while allowing for approval and release of payment transactions at anytime from anywhere. 
Services allowed on BBK BanKey Mobile App: 

-	Real time Balance Enquiry
-	Real time summary and detailed view of your accounts at BBK
-	Summary view of your loans at BBK
-	Summary view of your fixed deposits at BBK
-	View real time activity on your registered CrediMax Corporate Credit Cards
-	View transaction summary and details 
-	View Standing Instruction execution status
-	View transaction Status on Bulk Vendor Payments and Salary Transfers
-	Approve and Release the following type of transactions: 
o	Fund Transfers between BBK Accounts
o	International Fund Transfers
o	FAWRI and FAWRI+ Payments
o	FAWATEER Payments
o	Bulk Vendor Payments
o	Salary Transfers
o	CrediMax Corporate Card Payments

Additional features for BBK BanKey for IOS allows to sync with BBK BanKey on i-Watch 

Services allowed on i-Watch

-	Real-time balance enquiry
-	View recent transactions on your accounts
-	Receive alerts and notifications 

BBK BanKey Mobile App is built using highest security standards and uses dual factor authentication for transaction approval.  Enjoy the benefits of STP (straight-through-processing), quicker turnaround time and error free processing 24x7.

Binance is the world’s largest cryptoasset marketplace by trading volume*. Trusted by 250 million users worldwide, the Binance platform allows you to buy, sell, and hold up to 350 cryptoassets, including Bitcoin (BTC), Ether (ETH), Solana (SOL), Notcoin (NOT) and Pepe (PEPE) with some of the lowest trading fees in the market.

Risk Warning: Don’t invest unless you’re prepared to lose all the money you invest. This is a high-risk investment and you should not expect to be protected if something goes wrong. 
Not financial advice. All trading carries risk. Only risk capital you can afford to lose.
Take 2 mins to learn more:
https://www.binance.com/en-GB/legal/risk-warning.

Binance UK is presently not regulated or authorised by the UK Financial Conduct Authority ("FCA). Investments in cryptoassets are not covered by the Financial Ombudsman Service (“FOS”) or subject to protection under the Financial Services Compensation Scheme (“FSCS”).

Legal Entity: Nest Services Limited, trading as Binance, is the entity ultimately responsible for the Binance Services offered to UK based users through the Binance platform.

*by trading volume - Source: https://coinmarketcap.com/rankings/exchanges


Here's a small sample of what you can do on the Binance App:

- Choose from 350+ listed cryptoassets, set up recurring buys and price alerts, and trade with an arsenal of trading tools at your fingertips.
- Fund your account with a variety of payment options, including credit/debit card, P2P, and bank transfer.
- Automate your cryptoasset investments in a way that suits your preferences using Auto-Invest.
- All user funds are held 1:1 and protected by a Secure Asset Fund for Users (SAFU) worth $1 billion.
- Our ecosystem is built from the ground-up with state-of-the-art security measures, including real-time risk monitoring, stringent KYC protocols, and advanced end-to-end data encryption, to name a few.
- Participate in Binance Launchpad, or grow your portfolio with trading bots.
- In addition to an expansive, constantly-updated FAQ section, our 24/7 live chat customer support is available in English.

description:
Beyon Money – BEYOND than just a card.

The money management app that brings together all your financial essentials in one place.

ALL YOUR FINANCES IN ONE PLACE

Pay for all purchases, and send funds abroad instantly at the lowest rates in the market.

Track your spending, set targets, customize budgets, and get personalized insights at your fingertips.

Reach your financial goals and build stronger habits smartly and securely with Beyon Money.

REGISTER WITH A FEW EASY STEPS

And receive your active Beyon Money card on your phone instantly with no minimum salary or balance!

USE YOUR BEYON MONEY CARD, ANYWHERE

Shops and e-commerce platforms included.

Get a unique IBAN to receive transfers from your family and friends.

Transfer money internationally to Asia, Africa, GCC, Europe, and USA!

MAXIMIZE YOUR EXPERIENCE

Choose from the physical classic card or the platinum card for the ultimate Beyon Money experience.

The speed and ease of SADAD's payment kiosks is now in the palm of your hand. Using your phone, make instant payments, anytime, anywhere. You can pay for your phone, internet, and electricity and water bills, or you can recharge your prepaid lines. 

Use your debit card to make all your payments using the fastest and most convenient payment system in Bahrain.

FAVORITES

Got payments that you make all the time? Monthly bills or weekly balance top up? Just add them to your FAVORITES to make your future payments even quicker. 

24 HOUR CUSTOMER SUPPORT

Make your payments with the added peace of mind that you can call up our customer support team 24/7 at our toll-free number: 8000 8338
That's an industry first, and a reflection of our customer-centric philosophy.

AVAILABLE SERVICES

You can use any of the following services using our app:
** Recharge prepaid STC, Zain, and Batelco numbers
** Pay your phone bill for STC or Zain numbers.
** Pay your EWA bill
** Pay for your menatelecom bill or purchase prepaid internet vouchers.
** Transfer credit to international numbers through ding*
** Top up your CashU account

SHOP NOW. PAY LATER
Tabby lets you shop what you love and split purchases into four monthly payments — with no interest, no hidden fees and no surprises. Whether you're shopping online or in store, Tabby gives you control, financial flexibility and peace of mind.

SHOP FROM TOP BRANDS
Discover and shop your favorite brands including AMAZON, SHEIN, IKEA, ADIDAS, SIVVI, CENTREPOINT, and many more in one shopping app. The Tabby app is your one-stop shopping destination, packed with fashion, electronics, home goods, makeup, and more.

COMPARE PRICES & SAVE MONEY
Track price drops and compare products across multiple stores. With smart alerts, you’ll always get the best deal — your personal price-checker, built right in.

NEW DEALS AND DISCOUNTS EVERY DAY
Shop daily discounts, coupons and promotions from top brands. Never miss a deal — just open the app and see what’s new.

FIND NEARBY STORES THAT ACCEPT TABBY
Use our in-store map to discover shops and malls that accept Tabby. Try before you buy and still pay later. Search by brand, category or location.

ONE APP FOR ALL YOUR SHOPPING
Manage payments, track purchases, get reminders and explore new brands — all in one app.

PROTECT YOUR PURCHASE WITH TABBY CARE
Tabby Care adds extra peace of mind. It covers your purchases, makes returns easy and protects your order every step of the way.

24/7 CUSTOMER SERVICE
Use chat in the Tabby app for round-the-clock support.

Tabby gives you the freedom to pay later with no interest, no fees and no surprises — so you can shop on your terms.

Follow us to stay up-to-date on new stores and latest deals:

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/tabbypay/

X: https://x.com/paywithtabby/
